query:
ALTER TABLE bap_tracks 
ADD COLUMN pricePerStream INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 100 COMMENT 'In cents (default $0.01)' AFTER totalEarnings,
ADD COLUMN artistShare INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 90 COMMENT 'Percentage (90% default)' AFTER pricePerStream,
ADD COLUMN platformFee INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 10 COMMENT 'Percentage (10% default)' AFTER artistShare;
